title: Generator from American Community Survey (ACS) Geodatabases
text: American Community Survey (ACS) offers geodatabases geographic information associated data interest researchers area. goal geogenr facilitate access information functions allow us select geodatabases interest us, download , access information contain, filter export various formats can process tools required. packages available useful access data, tidycensus, works integrated way tigris. main characteristics geogenr distinguish proposals following: works locally, available geodatabases downloaded (can downloaded using package); supports access level group variables integrated layer, instead level variable vector variables; decomposes ACS composite variables structured fields; allows directly integrate variables several years; allows us export data formats. rest document structured follows: First, starting data presented. , illustrative example package works developed. Finally, document ends conclusions.

title: Generator from American Community Survey (ACS) Geodatabases
text: package based geodatabases available TIGER/Line Selected Demographic Economic Data web page. year (2012) list geodatabases appears two sections: Legal Administrative Areas; Statistical Areas. geodatabases bring together geography TIGER/Line Shapefiles data American Community Survey (ACS) 5-year estimates. ACS geodatabase structured layers: geographic layer, metadata layer, rest data layers. data layers matrix form, rows indexed instances geographic layer, columns variables defined metadata layer, cells numeric values. example: GEOID          B01001e1 B01001m1 B01001e2 B01001m2 B01001e3 B01001m3 B01001e4 B01001m4 ... 16000US0100100      218      165       92      114       10       16       18       30 16000US0100124     2582       24     1313       98       45       37       14       19 16000US0100460     4374       24     1963      158      144       76      105       68 16000US0100484      641      159      326       89       10       17       16       11 16000US0100676      295      102      143       55        7       11       14       17 16000US0100820    32878       57    16236      453     1159      257     1151      209 ... defined variables shown . Short_Name Full_Name B01001e1   SEX AGE: Total: Total Population -- (Estimate) B01001m1   SEX AGE: Total: Total Population -- (Margin Error) B01001e2   SEX AGE: Male: Total Population -- (Estimate) B01001m2   SEX AGE: Male: Total Population -- (Margin Error) B01001e3   SEX AGE: Male: 5 years: Total Population -- (Estimate) B01001m3   SEX AGE: Male: 5 years: Total Population -- (Margin Error) B01001e4   SEX AGE: Male: 5 9 years: Total Population -- (Estimate) B01001m4   SEX AGE: Male: 5 9 years: Total Population -- (Margin Error) ... variable (Short_Name) corresponds combinations various field values separated separator (:), forming string (Full_Name). field name value available topics included detailed web page Subjects Included Survey. tens thousands variables characteristics , addition metadata layer, can found TIGER/Line Selected Demographic Economic Data Record Layouts web page. combination values, one variable associated estimate another margin error defined. Within layer, variables can considered groups, defined first part Full Name (example UNWEIGHTED SAMPLE HOUSING UNITS SEX AGE). module geogenr package analyses components Full_name, structuring fields; allows access variables groups.

title: Generator from American Community Survey (ACS) Geodatabases
text: work data geogenr package distinguish three phases: obtaining data, data selection, generation results, developed . result structure generated, can export define queries .

title: Generator from American Community Survey (ACS) Geodatabases
text: data available form geodatabase. One geodatabase area two area groups. example, first, select download ACS geodatabases using functions offered package. folder (can distributed subfolders), can access information contain select one interests us. create object class acs_5yr, indicating folder download geodatabases. can query available geodatabases group, area, subject year using methods offered object. decide area work , download files already downloaded. also functions available consult previously downloaded data. data downloaded working folder associated object. can indicate classified year area. can also indicate automatically unzipped downloaded. case explicitly unzipped. operations already data available locally.
code: library(geogenr)  dir <- system.file("extdata/acs_5yr", package = "geogenr")  ac <- acs_5yr(dir) ac |>   get_area_groups() #> [1] "Legal and Administrative Areas" "Statistical Areas" ac |>   get_areas(group = "Legal and Administrative Areas") #>  [1] "American Indian/Alaska Native/Native Hawaiian Area" #>  [2] "Alaska Native Regional Corporation"                 #>  [3] "Congressional District (116th Congress)"            #>  [4] "County"                                             #>  [5] "Place"                                              #>  [6] "Elementary School District"                         #>  [7] "Secondary School District"                          #>  [8] "Unified School District"                            #>  [9] "State"                                              #> [10] "State Legislative Districts Upper Chamber"          #> [11] "State Legislative Districts Lower Chamber"          #> [12] "Code Tabulation Area"  ac |>   get_area_years(area = "Alaska Native Regional Corporation") #> [1] "2013" "2014" "2015" "2016" "2017" "2018" "2019" "2020" "2021" ac <- ac |>   select_area_files("Alaska Native Regional Corporation", 2020:2021)  files <- ac |>   download_selected_files(unzip = FALSE) #> [1] TRUE TRUE files <- ac |>   unzip_files()

title: Generator from American Community Survey (ACS) Geodatabases
text: unzipped, can consult available areas years. area can query topics available reports. can select one topics obtain reports contain.select , create object class acs_5yr_topic. can also select years reports included; default available years considered. topic selected, can consult available reports subreports. can focus report subreport, can also work reports contained topic. case going work entire topic.
code: ac |>   get_available_areas() #> [1] "Alaska Native Regional Corporation"  ac |>   get_available_area_years(area = "Alaska Native Regional Corporation") #> [1] "2020" "2021" ac |>   get_available_area_topics("Alaska Native Regional Corporation") #>  [1] "X01 Age And Sex"                     "X02 Race"                            #>  [3] "X03 Hispanic Or Latino Origin"       "X04 Ancestry"                        #>  [5] "X05 Foreign Born Citizenship"        "X06 Place Of Birth"                  #>  [7] "X07 Migration"                       "X08 Commuting"                       #>  [9] "X09 Children Household Relationship" "X10 Grandparents Grandchildren"      #> [11] "X11 Household Family Subfamilies"    "X12 Marital Status And History"      #> [13] "X13 Fertility"                       "X14 School Enrollment"               #> [15] "X15 Educational Attainment"          "X16 Language Spoken At Home"         #> [17] "X17 Poverty"                         "X18 Disability"                      #> [19] "X19 Income"                          "X20 Earnings"                        #> [21] "X21 Veteran Status"                  "X22 Food Stamps"                     #> [23] "X23 Employment Status"               "X24 Industry Occupation"             #> [25] "X25 Housing Characteristics"         "X26 Group Quarters"                  #> [27] "X27 Health Insurance"                "X28 Computer And Internet Use"       #> [29] "X99 Imputation" act <- ac |>   as_acs_5yr_topic("Alaska Native Regional Corporation",                    topic = "X01 Age And Sex") act |>   get_report_names() #> [1] "B01001-Sex By Age"        "B01002-Median Age By Sex" #> [3] "B01003-Total Population"

title: Generator from American Community Survey (ACS) Geodatabases
text: format, three layers defined: data geographical information names values variables instance, metadata description variables, origin metadata origin data. format allows us perform simple queries using metadata geographic layer. obtain consult content metadata: structured description variables. filter metadata using functions dplyr package. obtain new object whose data corresponds metadata obtained result selection operations. work new object, example, defining new variable graphing using associated geographic data.  Additionally, can export objects GeoPackage format use query tools, QGIS.
code: geo <- act |>   as_acs_5yr_geo() metadata <- geo |>   get_metadata()  metadata #> # A tibble: 1,436 × 12 #>    variable year  Short_Name Full_Name   report subreport report_var report_desc #>    <chr>    <chr> <chr>      <chr>       <chr>  <chr>          <int> <chr>       #>  1 V0001    2020  B01001Ae1  Sex By Age… B01001 A                  1 Sex By Age… #>  2 V0002    2020  B01001Ae10 Sex By Age… B01001 A                 10 Sex By Age… #>  3 V0003    2020  B01001Ae11 Sex By Age… B01001 A                 11 Sex By Age… #>  4 V0004    2020  B01001Ae12 Sex By Age… B01001 A                 12 Sex By Age… #>  5 V0005    2020  B01001Ae13 Sex By Age… B01001 A                 13 Sex By Age… #>  6 V0006    2020  B01001Ae14 Sex By Age… B01001 A                 14 Sex By Age… #>  7 V0007    2020  B01001Ae15 Sex By Age… B01001 A                 15 Sex By Age… #>  8 V0008    2020  B01001Ae16 Sex By Age… B01001 A                 16 Sex By Age… #>  9 V0009    2020  B01001Ae17 Sex By Age… B01001 A                 17 Sex By Age… #> 10 V0010    2020  B01001Ae18 Sex By Age… B01001 A                 18 Sex By Age… #> # ℹ 1,426 more rows #> # ℹ 4 more variables: measure <chr>, item1 <chr>, item2 <chr>, group <chr> metadata <-   dplyr::filter(     metadata,     item2 == "Female" &       group == "People Who Are American Indian And Alaska Native Alone" &       measure == "estimate"   ) geo2 <- geo |>   set_metadata(metadata)  geo2 |>   get_metadata() #> # A tibble: 2 × 12 #>   variable year  Short_Name Full_Name    report subreport report_var report_desc #>   <chr>    <chr> <chr>      <chr>        <chr>  <chr>          <int> <chr>       #> 1 V0671    2020  B01002Ce3  Median Age … B01002 C                  3 Median Age… #> 2 V1389    2021  B01002Ce3  Median Age … B01002 C                  3 Median Age… #> # ℹ 4 more variables: measure <chr>, item1 <chr>, item2 <chr>, group <chr> geo_layer <- geo2 |>    get_geo_layer()  geo_layer$faiana21vs20 <- 100 * (geo_layer$V1389 - geo_layer$V0671) / geo_layer$V0671 plot(sf::st_shift_longitude(geo_layer[, "faiana21vs20"])) dir <- tempdir() file <- geo |>   as_GeoPackage(dir)  sf::st_layers(file) #> Driver: GPKG  #> Available layers: #>   layer_name geometry_type features fields crs_name #> 1       data Multi Polygon       12   1453    NAD83 #> 2   metadata            NA     1436     12     <NA> #> 3     origin            NA        2      6     <NA>

title: Generator from American Community Survey (ACS) Geodatabases
text: can export reports theme flat_table star_database objects rolap package, allow us enrich additional information work directly OLAP tools. going export object star_database class. tables make star ROLAP design obtained. also show number instances table. can also export RDBMS.
code: st <- act |>   as_star_database() st_dm <- st |>   rolap::as_dm_class(pk_facts = FALSE) st_dm |>    dm::dm_draw(rankdir = "LR", view_type = "all") l_db <- st |>   rolap::as_tibble_list()  names <- sort(names(l_db)) for (name in names){   cat(sprintf("name: %s, %d rows\n", name, nrow(l_db[[name]]))) } #> name: anrc, 8572 rows #> name: dim_what, 359 rows #> name: dim_when, 2 rows #> name: dim_where, 12 rows

title: Generator from American Community Survey Geodatabases
text: ACS geodatabase structured layers: geographic layer, metadata layer, rest data layers. Accessing data structure trivial. goal geogenr package make easier. First, select download ACS geodatabases need. can use functions offered package download decompress means. create object class acs_5yr indicating work folder. can query available geodatabases area, subject year using methods offered object. also download geodatabases areas years need. unzip files check data available. consult themes available selected area also select one themes creating object class acs_5yr_topic. topic selected, can consult available reports subreports. can focus report subreport, can also work reports topic. can export reports selected topic various formats GeoPackage, also flat_table star_database rolap package. case going obtain GeoPackage. format also allows us perform simple queries using metadata geographic layer.  GeoPackage format can also easily perform queries tools QGIS.
code: library(geogenr)  dir <- system.file("extdata/acs_5yr", package = "geogenr")  ac <- acs_5yr(dir) ac |>   get_area_groups() #> [1] "Legal and Administrative Areas" "Statistical Areas"  ac |>   get_areas(group = "Legal and Administrative Areas") #>  [1] "American Indian/Alaska Native/Native Hawaiian Area" #>  [2] "Alaska Native Regional Corporation"                 #>  [3] "Congressional District (116th Congress)"            #>  [4] "County"                                             #>  [5] "Place"                                              #>  [6] "Elementary School District" download_selected_files(unzip = FALSE) #> [1] TRUE TRUE files <- ac |>   unzip_files()  ac |>   get_available_areas() #> [1] "Alaska Native Regional Corporation"  ac |>   get_available_area_years(area = "Alaska Native Regional Corporation") #> [1] "2020" "2021" ac |>   get_available_area_topics("Alaska Native Regional Corporation") #>  [1] "X01 Age And Sex"                     "X02 Race" Corporation",                    topic = "X01 Age And Sex") act |>   get_report_names() #> [1] "B01001-Sex By Age"        "B01002-Median Age By Sex" #> [3] "B01003-Total Population" geo <- act |> code: # Defined by: dir <- tempdir() source_dir <- system.file("extdata/acs_5yr", package = "geogenr") files <- list.files(source_dir, "*.zip", full.names = TRUE) file.copy(from = files, to = dir, overwrite = TRUE) #> [1] TRUE TRUE ac <- acs_5yr(dir)  files <- ac |>   unzip_files()  anrc_2021_x01 <- ac |>   as_acs_5yr_topic("Alaska Native Regional Corporation",                    2021,                    "X01 Age And Sex")

title: geogenr 2.0.1
text: CRAN release: 2024-01-09 Data export function geomultistar format: as_geomultistar(). Modify cph field description. Include logo website.

title: geogenr 2.0.0
text: CRAN release: 2023-11-05 New data model. Functions consult, select download available information. Functions select available information work . Functions filter export data GeoPackage. Functions export data objects rolap::flat_table rolap::star_database classes.

title: geogenr 1.0.1
text: CRAN release: 2023-10-11 Update documentation website. Use core pipe operator.

title: geogenr 1.0.0
text: CRAN release: 2020-11-19 Initial functionality. Functions obtain geodatabases. Functions select data. Functions generate results.
